gene.function: FUNCTION: Immunoregulatory receptor which inhibits the T-cell response (PubMed:24691993). May promote differentiation of embryonic stem cells, by inhibiting BMP4 signaling (By similarity). May stimulate MMP14-mediated MMP2 activation (PubMed:20666777). {ECO:0000250|UniProtKB:Q9D659, ECO:0000269|PubMed:20666777, ECO:0000269|PubMed:24691993}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cell membrane {ECO:0000269|PubMed:20666777, ECO:0000269|PubMed:24691993}; Single-pass type I membrane protein {ECO:0000255}.
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: negative regulation of CD4-positive, alpha-beta T cell proliferation [GO:2000562]
negative regulation of CD8-positive, alpha-beta T cell proliferation [GO:2000565]
negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production [GO:0032720]
positive regulation of collagen catabolic process [GO:0120158]
positive regulation of regulatory T cell differentiation [GO:0045591]
